sentences.en: Aubrey had slept little and that always made him peevish.
sentences.cn: 奥布里睡眠不足，这让他总是易怒。

sentences.en: He has grown peevish and fallen off from what he used to be.
sentences.cn: 他变得性情乖张,脾气暴躁,不似以前那么随和.

sentences.en: Injustice had made her peevish , and misery had made her ugly.
sentences.cn: 待遇的不平使她性躁, 生活的艰苦使她变丑.

sentences.en: Not to be peevish, or morose, or suspicious.
sentences.cn: 不暴躁, 发楞, 或多疑.

sentences.en: Prithee , darlingmost! - court me rather than the peevish prolix.
sentences.cn: 我请求你, 我的最爱! 追求我,毋宁倔强的冗说.

sentences.en: She glared down at me with a peevish expression on her face.
sentences.cn: 她低头瞪着我，一脸怒气。

sentences.en: She was peevish when she said that.
sentences.cn: 她说那个的时候是在撒娇.

sentences.en: Sneezes at evening, poking the peevish gutter.
sentences.cn: 到傍晚打喷嚏, 一边拨着劈啪的火.

sentences.en: The child is never peevish unless sick.
sentences.cn: 这孩子只有在生病时才会闹别扭.

sentences.en: The kids were peevish after so long in the car.
sentences.cn: 孩子们坐了这么长时间的汽车，随时会发脾气。

sentences.en: They were opionative, peevish, covetous, porase, vain, talkative.
sentences.cn: 他们固执 、 暴躁 、 贪婪 、 乖僻 、 虚荣, 多嘴.

sentences.en: They were peevish , crusty, silent, eying nothing in particular and moving their feet.
sentences.cn: 他们乖戾 、 执拗 、 沉默, 眼睛不知在看着什么,两脚一直动个不停.

sentences.en: Unreasonably irritable or ill - tempered; peevish.
sentences.cn: 脾气暴躁的深色蜜蜂, 大概原产于德国.

sentences.en: We don't want to live with peevish person.
sentences.cn: 我们不愿意和脾气暴躁的人生活.

trans.tran_en: easily annoyed by small and unimportant things
